mapper.insert: insert into IF_WCS_16 (TASKKY, TASKIT, CRC_LOCT, SKUKEY, DESC01, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, QTTRS, COMPYN, CREDATE, CREUSR, CMPFLG, CMPDATE) values (#{taskky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crcLoct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qttaor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qtcomp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qttrs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{compyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creusr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmpflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select TASKKY, TASKIT, CRC_LOCT, SKUKEY, DESC01, QTTAOR, QTCOMP, QTTRS, COMPYN, CREDATE, CREUSR, CMPFLG, CMPDATE from IF_WCS_16
